articles.description: Amazon is creating a new network called Sidewalk that will potentially make many internet-connected devices work better, set up easier and even help locate lost pets. But to do it, they will begin sharing a tiny portion of Ring and Echo device owner’s home in…

articles.author: Kanishka Singh
articles.title: Google removes some IAC browser extensions for 'policy violations' - Reuters
articles.description: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Sunday it has removed a number of browser extensions of online conglomerate IAC/InterActive Corp for "policy violations" and is reviewing "enforcement options."
articles.content:

articles.title: Jeff Bezos says this engine will take a woman to the moon for the first time - CNN
articles.description: NASA is planning on sending a woman to the moon in 2024, and when she makes the trip, she'll be in a BE-7 engine from Jeff Bezos' rocket venture, Blue Origin.
articles.content:
